name: Cows Getting Angry Lite
description:
Lite (5 levels) version of Cowz Getting Angry.

The dominant cow knows who's boss! Shoot Cowz out of a vehicle mounted cannon in a dynamics environment. These cows search through level after level of 3D fun, where they discover all kinds of obstables and push and shoot their way around. The farm animals must be brought down to the ground to advance. This creative adventure will have you laughing out loud as you enjoy 3D dynamics while utilizing logic and skill to squish the targets.

Features include advanced 3D presentation and control, multiple levels, and high performance dynamics environment and driving simulation.

- Tilt steering control through accelerometer, or as an option switch to arrow button directional control. Use single finger drag for camera control.

- 30 levels, bring animals down to earth to unlock each new level. (Lite version has 5 levels).
